message: I think this is a fair split that benefits us both.  Let's wrap this up quickly!

Given that your money loses 20% value each round while mine only loses 5%, this is actually a favorable deal for you. If you reject, your next round's money will be worth significantly less. Let's make a deal now.
Bob, I understand the situation, but your offer was too low. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
